name: Gummy Dad Colorland
description:
Version 1.3

DESCRIPTION:

Sharpen your reflexes and be ready to chalenge 60 levels full of traps in Gummy Dad Colorland !

Do you have the capacity to lead Gummy Dad through the colorful levels of this game?

Do you have the skills and accuracy to avoid all the traps and use to your advantage: conveyor belts, moving platforms, teleporters and all the obstacles scattered across the 4 worlds of the game ?

FEATURES:

★ 60 levels in 4 worlds
★ New game mechanics to discover in each world
★ Easy Keyboard / Mouse controls & XBOX360 gamepad support
★ Available in 3 languages: English, French and Japanese

CONTROLS:

Keyboard
Use directional keys to move and [ SPACE ] to Jump

Mouse
Click on left or right part of the screen with mouse to move and [ SPACE ] to Jump

Gamepad
Use analogique or d-pad to move, and any buttons (A, B, X or Y) to Jump
